title: promojo
author: promojo
content: CryptoCaverns.com is proud to announce to the Bitcointalk forum members - ASIC hosting in the USA.As markets are depressed, mining difficulty at all time highs and hosting/power companies raising prices on customers - Let us have the opportunity to build your trust and run your gear, with peace of mind!  As the markets first BBB A+ Accredited Hosting company, CryptoCaverns.com will be offering 7c/kWh to host your ASICs with free repairs and 97% uptime guarantees.Options:Buy direct and hostShip your own and hostHighlights:$0.07/kWh paid from mining profitsAutomatic Free Repairs97% Uptime Guaranteed, backed by our own equipmentYour slot includes first year’s rent, 2nd and 3rd years charged at the same rate as our inside equipmentValid on any ASICRepairs & Uptime Guarantee take effect after a 90 day grace period. Equipment that fails within that time will be rejected
